drivers.name: md2k
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

Part of the gdevmd2k-0.2a package by Shinya Umino. The web page and documentation are in Japanese. Here is an English translation of the driver's web page, and here is the README from the driver package.

drivers.name: ppmtocpva
drivers.comments: This driver works probably also on the Alps MD-XXXX printers.

drivers.name: ppmtomd
drivers.comments:
This driver works on the MicroDry thermal transfer printers: The Alps MD series, the Citizen printiva series, and the Okidata DP series. It is the successor of the "ppmtocpva" driver.

Note that the "-autoshift" feature is broken in the versions 1.0.2 and older. This is fixed in 1.0.3.

From version 1.1 on the Dye Sublimation mode is fully supported. The VPhoto mode and VPhoto primer support are available from version 1.3 on.

notes:
This is a multi-function device with scanner, scanning is not supported but printing works perfectly.

J.C. Bradfield (jcb@dcs.ed.ac.uk) has written a fully functional driver which converts PPM files. He started hacking ghostscript, but abandoned it.

Also listed as supported at 300/600/1200x600 dpi in the "md2k" driver documentation.
